required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Chemotherapy-induced Necrosis in Ewing Sarcoma: Which is the Best Scoring Tool

brief_summary.textblock: This is single institution cases series review of histological and clinical data

detailed_description.textblock: Investigators will retrieve from the database of the Rizzoli institute all the cases with a histological diagnosis of Ewing sarcoma from 01 Jan 1982 to 31 Dic 2012

primary_outcome.measure: retrospective analysis of cases of Ewing sarcomas
primary_outcome.description: Investigators will exam the histological response to chemotherapy in localized Ewing sarcoma of bone and correlate it to clinical outcome.

intervention.intervention_name: Scoring tool in Chemotherapy-induced necrosis in Ewing sarcoma
intervention.description: The aim of the present study is to evaluate which is the best scoring tool to determine the histological response to chemotherapy in localized Ewing sarcoma of bone. The study will exam all the different systems to evaluate the histological necrosis after neo-adjuvant chemotherapy in all patients with localized Ewing sarcomas of bone surgically treated between 1982 and 2012.

study_pop.textblock: Male and female patients surgically treated at Rizzoli Institute from 01 Jan 1982 to 31 Dic 2012 with diagnosis of Ewing sarcoma

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Male and female patients surgically treated at Rizzoli Institute from 01 Jan 1982 to 31 Dic 2012
2. Patients with diagnosis of Ewing sarcoma of bone who have had neo-adjuvant chemotherapy
3. Diagnosis of Ewing sarcoma localized
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Metastatic disease at presentation
2. Soft tissue origin
3. Radiotherapy before surgery

facility.name: Dept. of Pathology of IRCCS Istituto Ortopedico Rizzoli
